bug.author: wooksong
bug.description:
Build log
Test Group nnstreamer_filter_tensorflow Starts. [FAILED][Critical] 1:gst-launch of case 1 [FAILED][Critical] 1:Golden test comparison [FAILED][Critical] 2:gst-launch of case 2 [FAILED][Critical] 2:Golden test comparison ================================================== [FAILED] Test Group nnstreamer_filter_tensorflow has failed cases (4) Our amd64 build of nnstreamer (xenial/bionic) in launchpad has failed since at some point.

comments.comment: : Thank you for posting issue <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnstreamer/nnstreamer/issues/1440>#1440</denchmark-link> . The person in charge will reply soon.
: Thank you for posting issue <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnstreamer/nnstreamer/issues/1440>#1440</denchmark-link> . The person in charge will reply soon.

Architecture amd64 and armhf are failed.
Detailed Log: https://launchpadlibrarian.net/423296474/buildlog_ubuntu-xenial-amd64.nnstreamer_0.1.3.0-0~201905111312~ubuntu16.04.1_BUILDING.txt.gz

I am trying to upload pytorch debian to nnstreamer/ppa Building pytorch for architecture and failed because building failed - detailed logs - <denchmark-link:https://launchpad.net/~nnstreamer/+archive/ubuntu/ppa/+build/16798360/+files/buildlog_ubuntu-bionic-armhf.nnstreamer_0.1.3.0-0~201905151322~ubuntu18.04.1_BUILDING.txt.gz>https://launchpad.net/~nnstreamer/+archive/ubuntu/ppa/+build/16798360/+files/buildlog_ubuntu-bionic-armhf.nnstreamer_0.1.3.0-0~201905151322~ubuntu18.04.1_BUILDING.txt.gz</denchmark-link>
The error however is different compared to the error in the log posted by <denchmark-link:https://github.com/again4you>@again4you</denchmark-link>

The current error in nnstreamer launchpad for xenial is <denchmark-code>The following packages have unmet dependencies: sbuild-build-depends-nnstreamer-dummy : Depends: meson (>= 0.40) but it is not going to be installed E: Unable to correct problems, you have held broken packages. apt-get failed. Package installation failed </denchmark-code>
Maybe... we need to build meson in launchpad/nnstreamer first. It appears to emit errors in "test" stage; thus, the first workaround will be "disable test" in the meson debian build script.
@nnsuite/nnstreamer Fixed! We can close this issue now.
